predicate.comment: Frames file for '소중하' based on sentences in Virginia Corpus

example.text: 약혼자가 너한테 얼마나 소중한 존재인가를 나는 잘 알고 있어.
example.parse: (S (S-OBJ-1 (NP-SBJ 약혼자/NNC+이/PCA) (VP (NP (S (WHNP-2 *op*) (S (NP-SBJ *T*-2) (ADJP (NP-COMP 너/NPN+한테/PAD) (ADJP (ADVP 얼마나/ADV) (ADJP 소중하/VJ+은/EAN))))) (NP 존재/NNC+이/CO+는가/EFN+을/PCA)))) (S (NP-SBJ 나/NPN+은/PAU) (VP (VP (S-OBJ *T*-1) (VP (ADVP 잘/ADV) (VP 알/VV+고/ECS))) 있/VX+어/EFN)) ./SFN)
